channel.title: McCammon|Bannock County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in McCammon|Bannock County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 47
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 47 - US-30 East/Lava Hot Springs/Soda Springs/Montpelier. US-30 west joins I-15 and US-91 north to Pocatello.

item.title: Jensen Road/BL-15 North at I-15/US-91 North (Exit 44)
item.description: Jensen Road/BL-15 North at I-15/US-91 North (Exit 44) in McCammon. Use I-15/US-91 North to Inkom and Salt Lake. Continue north on BL-15 for McCammon.

item.title: I-15/US-91 Exit 44 Onramp
item.description: I-15/US-91 Exit 44 offramp at BL-15/Jensen Road. Turn left for BL-15 North to McCammon; right for Jenson Road to Robin.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 47
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 47 - US-30/McCammon/Soda Springs/Montpelier. US-30 eastbound leaves I-15 southbound here. This is the northern end of the McCammon business loop.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 47
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 47 - US-30 East/Lava Hot Springs/Soda Springs/Montpelier. US-30 west joins I-15 north to Pocatello.

item.title: I-15 North - Use US-30/ID-34 for Jackson,WY
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 47. Use US-30 East and ID-34 North for Jackson, Wyoming. Access to Lava Hot Springs Rec. Area.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 47
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 47 - US-30 East/Lava Hot Springs/Soda Springs/Montpelier

item.title: I-15 South Exit 47
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 47, US-30 to Soda Springs

item.title: US-30 West Approaching I-15/US-91
item.description: US-30 west approaching I-15/US-91 junction in McCammon.

item.title: US-30 West at BL-15 South
item.description: BL-15 shields on US-30 west approaching BL-15 junction in McCammon.

item.title: US-30 West at BL-15 South
item.description: BL-15 shields at US-30 west at BL-15 junction in McCammon.

item.title: US-30 West at I-15/US-91
item.description: I-15/US-91 south to Arimo and Salt Lake, and I-15/US-91 North/US-30 West to Inkom and Pocatello.

item.title: US-30 West at I-15/US-91 South
item.description: I-15/US-91 south to Arimo and Salt Lake on US-30 west, McCammon.

item.title: I-15 South Exit 47
item.description: BL-15/US-30/McCammon/Soda Springs Exit 47 on I-15 South

item.title: I-15/US-91 Exit 44 Onramp
item.description: I-15/US-91 freeway entrance at Exit 44 - Jensen Road (southbound) and BL-15/McCammon (northbound).
